thread.title: Obama extends US military mission in Afghanistan into 2017
thread.title_full: Obama extends US military mission in Afghanistan into 2017

title: Obama extends US military mission in Afghanistan into 2017
text: > International Obama extends US military mission in Afghanistan into 2017 Vice President Joe Biden follows President Barack Obama into the Roosevelt Room of the White House in Washington, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, where the president announced that he will keep U.S. troops in Afghanistan when he leaves office in 2017, casting aside his promise to end the war on his watch and instead ensuring he hands the conflict off to his successor. (AP Photo/Pablo Martinez Monsivais)
